name: Pullstar
description:
A survival game where you cannot evade and attack, but instead have to do one or the other with no direct control of the player character. Move the sun around with the mouse to attack enemies, but watch out! The wizard will be constantly pulled towards the sun and could collide into those enemies. 

Credit:

Thomas Carrillo - Programmer

Travis Carrillo - Animator

Matteo Munoz - Conceptional artist 

Music by Visager

Title Theme 

Ice Cave [Loop] 

 Eerie Mausoleum [Loop]
